wikipedia_page.main: Percy Cooke Bishop (1869 – 1961) was a British journalist and philatelist who proposed what became the Roll of Distinguished Philatelists. He was appointed to the Roll in 1921.

response: * Percy Cooke Bishop (1869–1961, United Kingdom), philatelic journalist and proposer of the Roll of Distinguished Philatelist.
* Percy Cooke Bishop (1869–1961), British journalist and philatelist
